name: mathiasmatzler.com
description: Personal web site for Matthias Matzler
author: Lukas Alber

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run dev
scripts.upload: cd dist && git init && git remote add origin https://github.com/mathiasmatzler/mathiasmatzler.github.io.git && git add . && git commit -m "v1.2" && git push --set-upstream origin master -f
